page.title: 15Skipping Rhymes
page.content: NOT LAST NIGHT BUT THE NIGHT BEFORE Not last night but the night before, 24 robbers came knocking at my door. As I ran out to let them in, This is what they said to me. Spanish lady{turn right round, Spanish lady{touch the ground Spanish lady{do high kicks Spanish lady{do the splits Spanish lady{go upstairs Spanish lady{say your prayers, Spanish lady{turn off the light, Spanish lady{say goodnight. When the rhyme says 'ran out' the person skipping has to run out of the skipping ring. When the rhyme says 'in' the person skipping has to run into the skipping ring. The person skipping has to performthe actions that are highlighted in the above rhyme.
